content: SDS-Plus Carbide Rebar Cutter Carbide tipped rebar cutter with SDS-Plus connection end for use in hammer drills. Use rotation mode only to drill through rebar ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits ### FEATURES:Features Engineered carbide tip for increased durability and longer life when drilling through rebar Designed with heat-resistance technology to reduce wear Applications Match diameter with the size of rebar intended to be drilled through Only designed for drilling through rebar, not meant for concrete drilling ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3903459 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 1 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903453 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 1/2 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903460 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 11/16 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903461 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 13/16 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903454 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 3/4 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903457 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 3/8 X 8 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903455 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 5/8 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903456 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 7/8 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903458 - Rebar Cutter TE-C 9/16 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc
